name: Mine Rush (itch)
description:
Control a mine cart to collect gems while avoiding obstacles in this endless game.

Mouse, touch, and controller compatible.

Made in 48 hours for 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Palette Jam for which the theme was Underground. Made in Unity 2018.3.4f. Used Piskel 0.14.0 for art and Bfxr 1.4.1 for sound effects.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
